name: Fashion Princess - Modern Celebrity Girls Makeup Makeover Stars Salon for iPhone & iPod Touch

description:
Is one of your hidden passions being a "Fashion Designer"? Experience high end awesome fashion fun! Design a model or experiment by taking your own look to a whole new level. Let your creativity flow design your own look and share with friends on facebook, twitter, by email or to gallery.

= ONE OF THE TOP GAMES OF 2013
